alert.note: Alert for Washington Palouse (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Wind Chill Warning issued December 21 at 3:47AM PST until December 22 at 12:00PM PST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...WIND CHILL WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THIS EVENING TO NOON PST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Wind chills of 20 to 30 degrees below zero expected. * WHERE...Moscow, La Crosse, Tekoa, Rosalia, Potlatch, Oakesdale, Plummer, Colfax, Uniontown, Genesee, and Pullman. * WHEN...From 7 PM this evening to Noon PST Thursday. * IMPACTS...The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes. Areas of drifting and blowing snow could lead to travel impacts.
info.instruction: Avoid outside activities if possible. When outside, make sure you wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.
